titles.title: A bill to temporarily prohibit the Secretary of Commerce from implementing regulations requiring the use of turtle excluder devices in the western Gulf of Mexico.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from Commerce, Interior.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 4/1/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of Commerce, until July 15, 1988, from implementing any rules or regulations which require the use in certain parts of the western Gulf of Mexico of devices which exclude sea turtles from shrimp trawl nets.
